title: BobMarley 1979 Nov 30
description:
Here is another vintage bootleg. Check my account for more classics.

Please enjoy, share with friends and please seed :)


Bob Marley & The Wailers
November 30, 1979
Oakland Auditorium Arena
Oakland, California, USA

Black and white in house DVD video. A bit marginal in the video quality - Kinda dark in some spots but a lot better than other copies of this show I've seen. The soundboard audio is very good to excellent sound quality soundboard and a definite improvement over previously circulating copies.

00:00:00 chapter 1 - Positive Vibration
00:05:33 chapter 2 - Wake Up And Live
00:11:02 chapter 3 - Concrete Jungle
00:16:08 chapter 4 - Them Belly Full
00:19:45 chapter 5 - I Shot The Sheriff
00:24:41 chapter 6 - Running Away >
00:29:58 chapter 7 - Crazy Baldheads
00:33:47 chapter 8 - Ambush In The Night
00:37:10 chapter 9 - Heathen
00:42:08 chapter 10 - War >
00:46:19 chapter 11 - No More Trouble
00:48:09 chapter 12 - No Woman No Cry
00:55:34 chapter 13 - [Cuts in] Lively Up Yourself
01:00:31 chapter 14 - Africa Unite
01:05:17 chapter 15 - One Drop
01:09:19 chapter 16 - Exodus
01:19:21 chapter 17 - encore break
(encores with Ron Wood):
01:20:37 chapter 18 - Is This Love? >
01:24:12 chapter 19 - Jammin'
01:29:27 chapter 20 - Ride Natty Ride
01:33:48 chapter 21 - Roots Rock Reggae >
01:37:47 chapter 22 - Natty Dread >
01:41:40 chapter 23 - Get Up Stand Up
01:50:35 end

Transfer: Sony SL-575UC > Sony DVMC-DA2 Media Converter (DV Hardware Codec Converter) > Final Cut Pro (capture, removal of bottom of screen head switch jitter noise, minor "nip and tuck" edits and chaptering) > Compressor > DVD Studio Pro (menu and DVD authoring) > VIDEO_TS file set.
Audio post capture processing in Pro Tools (normalization and a few level changes and minor clicks seamlessly removed). No Equalization or noise reduction. Audio placed back into Final Cut Pro before Compressor down-sampling.
Video attributes: NTSC 720x480 VBR 7.5 Mbps peak, 5.1 Mbps average data rate, 2-pass.
Audio: Dolby Digital 2/0 (L,R), 48 kHz sample rate, 448 kbps data rate. Stereo audio.
Enjoy and SHARE!
